segments.text: Hi Mike . What have you been up to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , and I need to start improving my health .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too . What are you doing besides exercising ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think if you eat better , it will help tremendously .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sleep is good too . I heard people who sleep an average of eight hours a day have less health problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Looks like there are a lot of things to do to stay healthy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: True . But I think it is worth it . When you get old , you want to be healthy and active .
segments.speaker: S2
